name: v0.26.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_uv", version = "0.26.0")
```


## What's Changed
* Update Multitool Versions by @thm-automation in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_uv/pull/112
* Update Multitool Versions by @thm-automation in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_uv/pull/115
* fix: move pip_compile macro to public API file by @alexeagle in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_uv/pull/114
* Update Multitool Versions by @thm-automation in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_uv/pull/116


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_uv/compare/v0.25.0...v0.26.0
